abstract: Morgan Stanley is preparing to wield the axe over its brokerage business, with plans to close down 300 branch offices and cut as many as 1,200 jobs in order to bring down costs related to the integration of the Smith Barney unit it bought from Citigroup last year, Fox Business reported.
snippet: Morgan Stanley is preparing to wield the axe over its brokerage business, with plans to close down 300 branch offices and cut as many as 1,200 jobs in order to bring down costs related to the integration of the Smith Barney unit it bought from Cit...
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley is preparing to wield the axe over its brokerage business, with plans to close down 300 branch offices and cut as many as 1,200 jobs in order to bring down costs related to the integration of the Smith Barney unit it bought from Citigroup last year, Fox Business reported.

headline.main: Morgan Said to Eye Deeper Brokerage Cuts
